title: Aathangara Marame Lyrics Kizhakku Cheemayile
stanzas:
Aathangara Marame Song Lyrics Kizhakku Cheemayile
#ARRahman #Mano #SujathaMohan

athaikku piranthavale
aalaagi nindravale
paruvam sumandhu
paavaadai thaamraiye

thattapoochi pudithaval
thaavanikku vandhatheppo
moondraam piraiye nee
mulu nilaa aanatheppo

mounathil nee irunthaal
yaaraithaan ketpathippo

aathangara marame
arasa mara ilaiye
aazha kilaiye
adhil urangum kiliye (2)

oada kara ulavu
kaathula oruthi
yaaru iva
vedichi nikkura
parthi thaavi vandhu
sandaiyidum andha mugama
thaavanikku
vandha ooru
nandhavanamaa

ulla sontham
enna vittu pogaathu
ada oada thanni
uppu thanni aagaathu

aathangara marame
arasa mara ilaiye
aazha kilaiye
adhil urangum kiliye

maamane unna kaangaama
vattiyil sorum ungaama
paavi naan parthi
maaraa ponene

kaaganthaan kathi ponaalum
kathavuthaan
saththam pottaalum
un mugam paakka
oadi vanthene

othayil oada karaiyoram
kathiye un peyar
sonnene

othayil oadum rayiloram
kathiye un peyar
sonnene

andha rail thooram
ponadhum neram
aanadhum kanneer
vittene

muthu maama enna
vittu pogaathe
en otha usuru
pona meendum
vaaraathe.

aathangara marame
arasa mara ilaiye
aazha kilaiye
adhil urangum kiliye

thavani ponne
sugamthaanaa
thangame
thazhumbum sugamthaana
paraiyil chinna patham
sugamthaana

thottavu ellaam
sugamthaanaa
thodaatha poovum
sugamthaana
thoppula jodi
marangal
sugamthaanaa

aithaiyum maamanum
sugamthaana
aathula meenum
sugamthaana (2)

anname unnaiyum
ennaiyum thookki
valartha thinnaiyum
sugamthaanaa

maaman ponne
machcham paarthu
naalaachu

un machaanukku
mayila pasuvu
thothaachu.

aathangara marame
arasa mara ilaiye
aazha kilaiye
adhil urangum kiliye

oada kara ulavu
kaathula oruthi
yaaru iva
vedichi nikkura
parthi thaavi vandhu

nandhavanamaa

ada oada thanni
